| History                 = The Master Race was a Neo-[[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazi]] group led by [[Max Lohmer (Earth-616)|Master Man]] and secretly funded by the [[Kronas Corporation (Earth-616)|Kronas Corporation]].{{r|Captain America Vol 5 18}}

They confronted and attacked [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]], [[Joseph Chapman (Earth-616)|Union Jack]], and [[Jacqueline Falsworth (Earth-616)|Spitfire]] while they were inspecting a Kronas ship in [[Tilbury Dock]].{{r|Captain America Vol 5 19}}

The superhero trio eventually defeated the Master Race as they were later trying to hijack a zeppelin over [[London (England)|London]].{{r|Captain America Vol 5 20}}

The Master Race members were later arrested after Captain America and his allies defeated the [[Sleepers (Robots)|Sleeper Robots]].{{r|Captain America Vol 5 21}}
